document_data.name: Cave moss
document_data.mainbody: '''Cave moss''' was a moss found in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Ecology: Although many creatures, such as [[roth√©]] and giant [[vermin]], fed on cave moss, it was inedible to [[humanoid]]s.
document_data.Locations: Cave moss grew solely in regions of ''[[faerzress]]'' in the Underdark.
document_data.Use: [[Drow]] and [[duergar]] learned to use cave moss to distill a potent non-deadly [[sleeping poison]].<ref>
